EmailTemplate.subject: Scope of Work Document for Independent Consultants
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, 2013 is the year for new contracts and clients for your consultancy. To prepare you, MBO Partners has brought you The Independent's Guide <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide>, the online library of educational content for independent workers.
This month, we're focusing on Creating an Independent Consulting Scope of Work Document <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/launch/creating-independent-consulting-scope-work-document-tips-and-template>. This article comes with a downloadable template you can take to your next contract negotiation.
Thank you for your time, and please contact MBO if you have questions or suggestions for new content. ___________________________________ MBO Partners t: 703-793-6000 e: info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
